summary: "Lost" is an American TV show that aired from 2004 to 2010. It's about people who survive a plane crash on a mysterious island in the Pacific Ocean. The show uses flashbacks and flashforwards to tell the characters' stories. It was inspired by the movie "Cast Away" and was known for its complex plot and large cast. "Lost" was very popular and won many awards, including an Emmy for Best Drama in 2005.
title: Lost (2004 TV series)
